mcq.statement: Who among the following was NOT a representative of the Muslim League at the Second Round Table Conference?
mcq.one_liner: **Sir Aga Khan, Maulana Shaukat Ali, Muhammad Ali Jinnah, A. K. Fazlul Huq, Allama Muhammad Iqbal, Muhammad Shafi and Muhammad Zafarullah Khan** were all representatives of the Muslim League at the Second Round Table Conference.

suggestions.topic: Quaid-e-Azam as President of Muslim League
